itemInfo.itemDesc: A Crude Stone used as material for Crafting.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Grinding Rough Stones.

item.name: Rough Stone
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Gathered with a Pickaxe from any rock on the ground.

item.name: Advanced Cooking Utensil
item.desc: A high-quality tool used when cooking.\n- It can be installed in a residence.\n- Additional effects applied later

item.name: Advanced Alchemy Tool
item.desc: A tool that can reconstruct the substance.\n- It can be installed in a residence.\n- Additional effects applied later
